title: Job Advertisement
welcomeText:
Job purpose: The Principal is responsible for leading, managing, and developing the Presidential School to ensure that it provides the highest standards of education and pastoral care to all students. The principal is also responsible for developing and maintaining effective relationships with all stakeholders, including PIIMA, students, staff, parents, the Board of Governors/Trustees, HR, and the wider community.

Key responsibilities:
	Recruit, retain, and develop high-quality staff, providing effective leadership and management to ensure that they are motivated, engaged, and supported in their roles.
	Ensure that students receive high-quality career advice and guidance that prepares them for further education, training, and employment.
	Promote the Presidential School effectively, building a positive reputation in the local community and beyond.
	Manage the budget, resources, and facilities of the Presidential School to ensure that they are used effectively and efficiently.
	Ensure that the Presidential School meets all statutory and regulatory requirements.
